price: តើពួកគេគិតថា ពិតប្រាកដណាស់ អ្វីដែលយើងផ្ដល់ឱ្យពួក គេអំពីទ្រព្យសម្បត្ដិ និងកូនចៅ
arabic: أَيَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّمَا نُمِدُّهُم بِهِۦ مِن مَّالٖ وَبَنِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: ayaḥsabūna annamā numidduhum bihi min mālin wabanīna
